title: bitzizzix
author: bitzizzix
content: We've hit $100,000, even $101,000 and that's the same thing I've said many times that Bitcoin will hit $100,000 in early December, and maybe it'll come down a little bit closer to Christmas. And I always say when there's a thread that Bitcoin won't hit $100,000 or it's going to happen in 2025 and in fact it's happening so fast that I think in 2025 Bitcoin will hit $150,000-$180,000.

comments.author: freedomgo
comments.body: It’s a milestone for Bitcoin, and I’m glad I wasn’t asleep when it finally hit $100k - it’s one of those moments you don’t want to miss!I checked the news, and it’s interesting that they’re attributing this success to Donald Trump... would you believe that? Bitcoin tops $100,000 on optimism over Trump crypto plansBitcoin Hits $100,000, Lifted by Hopes of a Crypto-Friendly Washington
